[[VK_EXT_display_control]]
=== VK_EXT_display_control

*Name String*::
    `VK_EXT_display_control`
*Extension Type*::
    Device extension
*Registered Extension Number*::
    92
*Revision*::
    1
*Extension and Version Dependencies*::
  * Requires Vulkan 1.0
  * Requires `<<VK_EXT_display_surface_counter>>`
  * Requires `<<VK_KHR_swapchain>>`
